add_library(acutest INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(acutest INTERFACE acutest)

if (USE_EXTERNAL_GLFW)
    message(NOTICE "Using external GLFW")
    find_library(REQUIRED glfw)
else()
    message(NOTICE "Building GLFW from source")
    set(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "Build GLFW examples")
    set(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build GLFW tests")
    set(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "Build GLFW docs")
    set(GLFW_INSTALL OFF CACHE BOOL "Generate GLFW installation target")
    add_subdirectory(glfw)
endif()

add_subdirectory(semb)
